stride.name: Stride
stride.description: Integrate your game with Stride Academy.

strongetgamedata0.description: Triggered when game data requested with 'Get game data' is received.

strontimerdone1.description: Triggered when the external session timer has expired.

strissoundenabled2.description: If TRUE, the game is allowed to play sounds.

strsubmitgamescore1.display-text: Submit player's points earned {0} and high score {1}
strsubmitgamescore1.description: Submit points earned and high score to Stride Academy.

points0.name: Points
points0.desc: The number of points scores in the current game session.

strsetgamedata2.display-text: Store player data {1} under key name {0}
strsetgamedata2.description: Store player data on the Stride Academy server.

key0.name: Key
key0.desc: Identifies the data to be stored.

value1.name: Value
value1.desc: The string value to be stored.

strgetgamedata3.display-text: Retrieve player data under key name {0}
strgetgamedata3.description: Retrieve player data from the Stride Academy server.

key0.name: Key
key0.desc: Identifies the data to be retrieved.

strstarttimer4.description: Starts the Stride Academy external countdown timer.

showmessage0.name: showMessage
showmessage0.desc: Set this to 1 to cause Stride Academy to show a 'Times up' message to the user.

strstoptimer5.description: Stops (pauses) the Stride Academy external countdown timer.

badgename0.name: BadgeName
badgename0.desc: Identifies the badge to be awarded.

sessionseconds0.description: If using your own timer, the amount of time to allow for one session.

defaultgamedata1.description: Data that was previously stored using the key 'playerData'.

gamedata2.description: The response data from 'Get game data'.

badgelist4.description: A comma-delimited list of badges previously earned.

enablesound5.description: Should sound be enabled? 0 = no, 1 = yes.

gender7.description: The player's gender: M = male, F = female.

gradelevel8.description: The player's grade level: -1 = PreK, 0 = KG, 1 = 1st, etc.

ethnicity9.description: A 1-2 character code for the player's ethnicity.
